data.title: Embassy News
data.text:
On 8thâAugust, H.E. Ambassador Xiao Jianguo was invited to attend the closing ceremony of Oversea Innovation Project Program between Tianjin Universityâ(TJU) and Universiti Teknologi Bruneiâ(UTB), and had friendly talks with Datin Paduka Professor Dr.âDayang Hajah Zohrah Haji Sulaiman, Vice-Chancellor of UTB.

Ambassador Xiao spoke highly of theexchanges between the two universities, and expected the educational institutions on both sides to deepen cooperation and cultivate high-quality talents for the respective modernization and enhance the friendship betweenâtheâtwo countriesâand peoples .
